p: The CF was developed based on Dickoff et al.’s ( 1968) practice-oriented theory and Donabedian’s ( 1966) SPO model. Both Dickoff et al.’s practice-oriented theory and Donabedian’s SPO model enabled the researcher to identify and incorporate the different features so that these coalesce to provide the emerging phases 1–3 results, and eventually a CF. The development of CF is described next.
